highLevelSummary: Create a v2 endpoint using 'displayName' and deprecate 'username' in v1. Both versions will coexist.

roadmap.title: Create v2 Endpoint
roadmap.description: Implement GET /v2/users returning the new shape with displayName.

roadmap.title: Deprecate v1 Field
roadmap.description: Add deprecation notice to the username field in the v1 interface/response definition.

roadmap.title: Update Tests
roadmap.description: Add tests for v2 and ensure v1 tests still pass.

constraints: v1 must remain unchanged in behavior
